action.description: Action type. Must be `"GET"` for file download.

fileKey.description: S3 key for the file to download.

organisation.description: Organisation slug (optional, not directly used by the GET logic).

clerk_jwt.description: JWT issued by Clerk. The token must be included in the `Authorization` header as a Bearer token. Users must be part of the target organisation and have the required role (e.g., `admin`) to access protected resources.

get.description: Returns a list of all bundles for a given organisation and event.

200.description: Returns a list of all bundles.

post.description: Creates a new bundle and stores it for the given event.

207.description: Bundle created successfully with some unprocessed bundles.

put.description: Update existing bundles for a given event.

get.description: Fetch details of a specific bundle by its KSUID.
